title: Radiant Baseboard Heat, BBQ & Picnic Area, Laundry Facility
posting_body: ['Huntington House’s plush, landscaped courtyards with two community pools, walking paths, sundecks, barbecues and picnic tables welcomes residents with the perfect environment to call “home”.', 'Each apartment offers spacious floor plans, beautiful views of the courtyards and private entry.', 'Located on Fort Street enjoy Huntington House’s neighborhood charm in the city.', 'We would love for you to come on by and see what Huntington House has to offer!', '-Late Fee Forgiveness', '-Private Entrance', '-One $35 Application Fee Per Apartment, Not Per Person', '-Laundry Facility', '-Sparkling Clean Swimming Pool', '-Additional Storage', '-No Security Deposit Required', '-Radiant Baseboard Heat', '-Online Payment Options (Credit Card, Debit Card and ACH)', '-BBQ & Picnic Area', '-Picture Windows with Courtyard Views', '-Upgraded Units Available', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
